SQL.LOAD: SELECT audit_date, log_source, audit_security_type_code, client_ip_address, ip_address_chain, x509_certificate, user_name, request_url, action_name, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, audit_security_log_id FROM elp_audit_security_logs WHERE audit_security_log_id = :audit_security_log_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT --ASL.AUDIT_SECURITY_LOG_ID id, ASL.AUDIT_DATE, Elita.Getdescriptionfromitemextcode(ASL.LOG_SOURCE, :language_id) as LOG_SOURCE, Elita.Getdescriptionfromitemextcode(ASL.AUDIT_SECURITY_TYPE_CODE, :language_id1) as AUDIT_SECURITY_TYPE_CODE, ASL.CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS, ASL.IP_ADDRESS_CHAIN, ASL.X509_CERTIFICATE, ASL.USER_NAME, ASL.REQUEST_URL, ASL.ACTION_NAME FROM ELP_AUDIT_SECURITY_LOGS ASL Where --dynamic_where_clause order by AUDIT_DATE, LOG_SOURCE, AUDIT_SECURITY_TYPE_CODE, CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS, USER_NAME desc
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_audit_security_logs SET audit_date = :audit_date, log_source = :log_source, audit_security_type_code = :audit_security_type_code, client_ip_address = :client_ip_address, ip_address_chain = :ip_address_chain, x509_certificate = :x509_certificate, user_name = :user_name, request_url = :request_url, action_name = :action_name, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE audit_security_log_id = :audit_security_log_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_audit_security_logs ( audit_date, log_source, audit_security_type_code, client_ip_address, ip_address_chain, x509_certificate, user_name, request_url, action_name, created_by, audit_security_log_id ) VALUES ( :audit_date, :log_source, :audit_security_type_code, :client_ip_address, :ip_address_chain, :x509_certificate, :user_name, :request_url, :action_name, :created_by, :audit_security_log_id )
